CustomField.description: This field is populated with an invoice number after the quote (open invoice) is created. This field will always contain the primary quote's invoice number. Thus, if a new quote is created and is primary, the old text value will be replaced with the newest Primary Quote's Invoice Number value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is populated with an invoice number after the quote (open invoice) is created. This field holds the primary quote's Invoice Number.
CustomField.label: ISN Invoice Number
